data.eml:eml: Species status of Centrolene lema Duellman and Señaris, 2003 (Amphibia: Centrolenidae) revealed by Integrative Taxonomy

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Castroviejo-Fisher, Santiago, Guayasamin, Juan M., Kok, Philippe J. R. (2009): Species status of Centrolene lema Duellman and Señaris, 2003 (Amphibia: Centrolenidae) revealed by Integrative Taxonomy. Zootaxa 1980: 16-28, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.185278
